# GuildCommandAttribute constructor

Creates a discord command to be used in guild

```csharp
public GuildCommandAttribute(string name, bool isLocalized = false)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| name | Name of the command |
| isLocalized | If the command name is the localization key for the command |
